headline: Lockheed Martin launches subsidiary Astris AI to offer AI solutions
summary: The foundational tools available through Astris AI comprise Lockheed Martin’s MLOps and generative AI software platforms.

headline: Lockheed Rides on Solid Order Growth Despite Labor Shortage
summary: LMT is expected to benefit from its steady inflow of orders and strong international demand for its broad range of products amid the shortage of skilled labor.

headline: Seventh Lockheed Martin-Built GPS III Satellite Launches, Supporting Next-Gen Constellation Modernization and Rapid Launch Capability
summary: This evening at 7:52 p.m. ET, the seventh Lockheed Martin [NYSE: LMT]-designed and -built Global Positioning System (GPS) III space vehicle, GPS III SV07, launched from Cape Canaveral Space Force Station, Florida, into orbit 12,550 miles above earth.
